Lyric:
[by:7ovicii]
[00:21.63]May our hearts be full like our drinks tonight
[00:26.01]May we sing and dance 'til we lose our minds
[00:31.06]We are only young if we seize the night
[00:35.76]Tonight we own the night
[00:40.19]Tonight we own the night
[00:45.69]When my time is over, lying in my grave
[01:25.90]Written on my tombstone, I want it to say,
[01:34.72]This man was a legend, a legend of his time
[01:39.33]When he was at a party, the party never died
[01:44.24]Hey, everybody's got a dream so what do you say
[01:51.22]Are we making history?
[01:53.33]May our hearts be full like our drinks tonight
[01:58.10]May we sing and dance 'til we lose our minds
[02:02.94]We are only young if we seize the night
[02:07.74]Tonight we own the night
[02:12.28]Tonight we own the night
[02:17.24]When my time is over, lying in my grave
[02:59.89]Written on my tombstone, I want it to say,
[03:04.72]This man was a legend, a legend of his time
[03:09.35]When he was at a party, the party never died
[03:14.32]Hey, everybody's got a dream so what do you say
[03:21.18]Are we making history?
[03:23.64]May our hearts be full like our drinks tonight
[03:28.22]May we sing and dance 'til we lose our minds
[03:33.20]We are only young if we seize the night
[03:38.08]Tonight we own the night
[03:42.51]Tonight we own the night
